title: 820-3115-B stuck on boot
message:
No liquid damage.
During boot it freezes with blocks of text.
Tried safe mode it freezes.
Tried verbose mode it stops at a point.
Tried the ram slots with no luck.
Tried booting from external HDD: it shuts of the machine after a while.
Any advice?

title: 820-3115-B stuck on boot
message: Did you try with a known good stick of PC10600 RAM?

title: 820-3115-B stuck on boot
message: Just an FYI, the 820-3115 uses PC12800 RAM as standard.

title: 820-3115-B stuck on boot
message: I tried with many kinds of good ram sticks. Still the same.

title: 820-3115-B stuck on boot
message: Did you try one slot at a time? What process is reported as crashing in the kernel panic?

title: 820-3115-B stuck on boot
message:
No Title

I tried. Same results.

title: 820-3115-B stuck on boot
message: Hope this one uploads in bigger resolution.

title: 820-3115-B stuck on boot
message: Upload somewhere else. That is a verbose boot screen. Does it always kernel panic when you boot normal?

title: 820-3115-B stuck on boot
message:
[I]Yes it does kernel panic every time with normal boot too.

Here is the picture:
[url]https://unsee.cc/boparigu/[/url][/I]

title: 820-3115-B stuck on boot
message: I have no idea, could be anything that hangs the CPU. One thing to try is the BIOS, backup original!!

title: 820-3115-B stuck on boot
message: Re-flashed the bios. This time it will boot very very slowly and at the end of the boot just stops.

title: 820-3115-B stuck on boot
message:
Need a clean ME to work, try this one:

[url]https://drive.google.com/open?id=0ByfhQ_x0v-tZYy1WaGhQNTVQME0[/url]

title: 820-3115-B stuck on boot
message: Run EFI version of ASD and check for errors

title: 820-3115-B stuck on boot
message: No idea, it could be anything. Any clues when you boot in verbose mode?

title: 820-3115-B stuck on boot
message: Some kind of CPU panic "TLB invalidation IPI timeout" , "CPU(s) failed to respond to interrupts"

title: 820-3115-B stuck on boot
message: Yeah, this can be anything. I doubt this is worth trying to fix unless there is some history as how this happened.
